11
Scenarios for Building Ontology Networks within the NeOn Methodology
Scenario 7: Reusing ontology design patterns
Access ODPs repositories to reuse ODPs
for different purposes:
▪to reduce modeling difficulties,
▪to speed up the modeling process, or
▪to check the adequacy of modeling
decisions 
http://ontologydesignpatterns.org
